website_summaries.verdict: You couldn’t ask for a better recreation of the famously weak fish Pokémon, and this flopping Magikarp is a hilarious must-have for its many fans.
pros: Set Magikarp on its side and watch it splash about for 10 seconds
Looks like it does in the video games
cons: Needs a small screwdriver to replace its batteries

customer_reviews.title: Highly amusing for kids, grown-ups, and cats
customer_reviews.text: "Flopping action" is exactly as per the description-- what more do I need to say? Seriously, though, this makes kids and adults alike laugh out loud and can entertain cats for hours, and I think it's the only plushie my partner wants to have on display. It has stood up fine so far to cats (who can trigger it on their own!); dogs reportedly like it as well, but are definitely more likely to destroy it. Keep it out of your fish tank and don't evolve it. ;) Batteries not included; this takes three AAAs, which you'll want to have ready when this arrives. Note that you'll need a small screwdriver to open the battery compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Bibliophile

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and clever!
customer_reviews.text: This made a wonderful Valentine's gift! I'm very pleased with it, but I would prefer it to stay on for a bit longer than 10 seconds per activation. Also, it would have been really neat to have had sounds added. Regardless, this is pretty awesome imo and was well appreciated by the recipient!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: we were very unimpressed with the so-called "flopping" and "wiggling". it mostly just shakes... violently. it's also noisy because of the mechanism inside. the plush itself is quite nice though. it is soft, well stuffed, and looks exactly like the pictures, but i don't think it is worth the almost $30 paid, including tax. also it did NOT come with batteries
customer_reviews.author: M&B

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for Pokémon-Loving Family/Friend
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love our Magikarp! It was a gift for my husband and Pokémon-loving kids at Christmas and we’ve all gotten a ton more enjoyment than I expected. It has quite a lot of flip and flop to it and goes off with only a little jostling. It’s large enough that smaller children can cuddle it like a baby doll. I’d highly recommend it for any Pokémon-loving friend or family member.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Chiappisi

customer_reviews.title: Girlfriend and Son love it.
customer_reviews.text: We are unabashed Pokemon fans in this household, and this flopping Magikarp was a huge hit as a Christmas gift. We find the motor inside (batteries not included) to be the right balance of movement for the Magikarp, especially if placed on a flat surface. Please note that it moves for a period of about 10 seconds once activated, there is no way to have it continuously move by itself without user input. Would definitely recommend for the Pokeman fan in your life.
customer_reviews.author: C.Huey

customer_reviews.title: Magikarp loves to flop around
customer_reviews.text: This Magikarp toy is wonderful. Its decently sized and easy to get to the battery ball when the batteries go bad. Its also very touchy. The slightest bump or shake will set it off, but that doesn't bother me or my Pokémon loving brothers one bit, if anything we find it kind of humorous when it goes off because it causes a little mayhem and destruction.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Bush

customer_reviews.title: Nice plush with fun gimmick
customer_reviews.text: I bought this plush Magikarp because I collect Pokemon plush. I decided this would be cool to put on my desk at work as it would be a good joke. Others in the office love it and it provides some needed levity throughout the day. The plush is accurate to Magikarp design and very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Kotchbot

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints
customer_reviews.text: Perfect no complaints...it's exactly what I thought it would be and it is a lot bigger than I thought. Thought it was going to be. Small toy but it's perfect size. And it works well! Makes me laugh every time. My dog hates it but it's funny.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Tran

customer_reviews.title: Great gift. The grandsons love it
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift. I installed the batteries and then wrapped it. The gift box jumped around when my grandson was opening it!! Everyone was pretty curious as to what was in the box. very entertaining. The kids love it
customer_reviews.author: Lyn Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality; Good for Kids & Adults
customer_reviews.text: This is good quality with plush fabric and well stitched. My husband was very amused & the flopping feature works really well. He enjoyed setting it to go off if the cats touched it and watching them scurry & then come back to fight Magikarp. He has held up over several cat attacks.
customer_reviews.author: LSMLN8891

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I did what it said to turn it on and it would never flop. I checked the battery compartment and put new batteries in and it still did not work. I think I got a defective unit. I'd appreciate a replacement although I am outside of the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Good value and funny
customer_reviews.text: The Magikarp is 10 inches so don't expect something giant. You can hold it easily with one hand. It's a fun little plush toy that will get a laugh from those who like Pokemon. The wiggle / shake that is supposed to be Magikarp's trademark move "Splash" is pretty cool. The only negative to this toy is the sound from the vibrating. Besides that... I have enjoyed this little fish.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Good one to choose
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 16 month child and he loves it. Good quality fabric and the battery life is better than I expected. You will need a jewelers screwdriver (or other small screwdriver) to get the batteries in.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Stover

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy. No matter how much I tap it, it wont flop I have to press the button on the inside. Also the instructions talk about a on off button but mine just has the button that makes it flop :/ not what was described
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prefers a tender ‘karp
customer_reviews.text: My son was annoyed that there is something hard requiring batteries inside this. It’s my fault for not reading the description. I learned the hard way the importance of softness in my son’s Magicarp preferences. Whoops.
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: Yayuh
customer_reviews.text: This item is worth every penny. And that's saying alot when it comes to gift items from amazon nowadays. Verified purchase good toy
customer_reviews.author: P corps

customer_reviews.title: Fun Pokemon toy
customer_reviews.text: My son (age 9) loves this toy. Vibrates, plush, fun. If you have a kid into Pokemon, he/she will probably enjoy this.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Laughs for days
customer_reviews.text: Clearly every child wants a flopping fish or so I have to guess from the excitement mine showed when this was opened. Might be the best birthday present ever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He is lovely
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and cute Magikarp plush. Good size and comes with a funny built in rumble feature. We loved this one a lot. I'd definitely recommend this for anyone into Pokemon or stuffers.
customer_reviews.author: James K

customer_reviews.title: Great plush Pokemon thats flops
customer_reviews.text: My nephew was really excited to get his favorite Pokémon as a ‘flopping’ plush for the holidays. The figure itself is of good size and quality, soft on the outside. The battery storage/device does make it more firm inside so not the best for full on cuddling. The flopping motion was somewhat minimal but we weren’t expecting anything crazy. Overall, good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel H

customer_reviews.title: Very good, room for improvement
customer_reviews.text: Son loved this. With the flopping mechanism out very soft and cuddly. With flopping mechanism in not comfortable. The batteries are a pain to get into the flopping mechanism, requires a small screwdriver.
customer_reviews.author: guy friday

customer_reviews.title: Magikarp used splash! Nothing happened!
customer_reviews.text: My son likes it all. He loves jumping around with it and making it shake.
customer_reviews.author: Zoë

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!
customer_reviews.text: It’s great! The puppy stole it as hers, and it makes me laugh every time I see it start flopping around.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Henderson

customer_reviews.title: it's everything you hoped it would be
customer_reviews.text: it's a simple toy but hilariously in flavor. The flopping action works pretty great for what it is. This thing will creep across a long table if you set it right, and perhaps the best feature is that it'll start up randomly when moved, so anyone picking it up off your desk will be in for a rightful fright. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it. It flops around like a real magikarp.
customer_reviews.author: Jerun

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This is the best. Just like you would assume a real Magikarp would be like. Minus the slippery scales. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Baby thinks it's funny.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. She's 14 months old and think it's hilarious.
customer_reviews.author: Synter

customer_reviews.title: It’s great
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved it! He’s a huge Pokémon fan and this made his Christmas that much more special!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Butkovich

customer_reviews.title: Magikarp flops!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well, it’s a stuffed, flopping Magikarp ... what else could you want?! It does randomly turn itself on, which is startling, but also funny at the same time. The product is exactly what it’s described - Pokémon fans need it for their collections! #MagikarpArmy
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Neil  Brown

customer_reviews.title: This product is definitely not a flop!
customer_reviews.text: This magikarp is super soft and flops around really well! It takes 3 triple A batteries (not included). The batteries are pretty easy to put in, just undo 4 small phillips head screws. Well worth $22.
customer_reviews.author: Norm F Foran

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: So much better quality than what I expected, when it “flops” it does move around enough and lasts just the right amount of time so it’s not annoying. Easy to activate but not so easy it just goes off whenever. Good toy for child dog or adult.
customer_reviews.author: Durs

customer_reviews.title: Flops well
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Batteries are a little difficult to put in but it vibrates enough to move across the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas B Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Best gift ever. 😂😂 it shakes more than flops. Which makes it even funnier & NO IT IS NOT MAKING FUN OF YOUR EPILEPSY.
customer_reviews.author: Beauchamps

customer_reviews.title: Magikarp used splash!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool plush. Must have if you don’t have a Magikarp! I really like the play features as well.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Fontalvo

customer_reviews.title: Magikarp go!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is hilarious and makes everyone giggle. It doesn't lose its charm and is a fun thing to just toss around to watch wiggle.
customer_reviews.author: Lee V. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like Magikarp
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what they’re trying to sale. Good quality at an ok price. Looks just like the picture and just like Magikarp.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Lagua

customer_reviews.title: Did not do anything
customer_reviews.text: I received a stuff fish. It does not do anything. I gave my grandson a stuufed fish that does not flip, flop or shake. Is there anything you can do? You sent wrong ond
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my mom who loves Magikarp.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Exactly came just as it looks
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift was a hit.. my grandson loved the fish
customer_reviews.author: John F. Gray

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: The first one was faulty, but the seller was approachable and sent us a new one which worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon D. Bender

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I love this guy. I'm gifting him to my niece for Christmas. Not sure what I was expecting as far as size, but I guess I did expect him to be a tad bigger, but the quality of him is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Keegan

customer_reviews.title: Endlessly entertaining!
customer_reviews.text: As a fan of the Detective Pikachu movie and now pokemon in general, I bought this Magikarp plush and it's hilarious! It is made of minky microfiber plush material, very soft and high quality, well detailed. When you remove the inner tag, you can slap it to activate the "flop", which is a somewhat loud motorized sound while the fish kind of bounces forward or in circles. Not necessarily a flop, as it doesnt flip sides. But it's still pretty great, very funny, and endlessly entertaining! Definitely a fun gift or toy. Requires 3 AAA batteries which are included, plush works out of box. Comes with instructions and attached to small box.
customer_reviews.author: Lil' E

customer_reviews.title: Super flopping action
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend got me this as a gift since he knows I love magikarp I absolutely love it! He flops all over the floor for 10 seconds at a time. Great plush for fun and collecting!
customer_reviews.author: Trance Pacifica

customer_reviews.title: Very entertaining but doesn't stay wiggling long
customer_reviews.text: The Magikarp doesn't keep wiggling for very long and you have to keep touching it to keep it wiggling.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ruhl

product_meta.title: Pokemon Pokémon Flopping Magikarp Plush - 10 Inch Interactive Fish Toy Flops, Wiggles and Shakes - Age 4+
product_meta.description: Get ready to watch everyone’s favorite fish Pokémon come to life! Just tap Magikarp on the side and watch the flopping fun begin! Magikarp will flip, flop, and flail for 10 seconds straight after each tap! This super soft plush is fun and cuddly and a must have for any Pokémon fan! Gotta Catch ‘Em All! Suitable for ages 4 years and up. - - Cute and interactive Pokémon Magikarp Plush Stuffed Animal is a must have for all Pokemon fans! This super soft plush figure is great to take wherever you go! The Magikarp plush toy is inspired by Pokémon anime, trading cards, Let's Go! and Nintendo video games series! Also inspired by the scene in the detective pikachu movie! Makes a great gift for fans of Pokemon - Your favorite Pokémon character is waiting for you! Officially licensed Pokémon merchandise by Wicked Cool Toys. Polyester.
feature_bullets: IT REALLY FLOPS! Get ready to watch everyone’s favorite fish Pokémon come to life! Interactive Pokémon Magikarp Flopping Action Plush Stuffed Animal is a must have for all Pokemon fans!
TOUCH SENSOR! Watch the flopping fun begin! Give Magikarp a squeeze and he will wiggle, jiggle, shake and flop for 10 seconds!
This Super Soft 10 Inch Magikarp plush toy is inspired by Pokémon Let's Go! and a scene from the recent Detective Pikachu Movie
Makes a great gift for fans of Pokemon! Gotta Catch 'Em All!
Officially licensed Pokémon merchandise by Wicked Cool Toys. Measures 10" to tip of tail. Polyester. 3 AAA Batteries not included. Ages 4+.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars175 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
